item.title: 2 potholes towards the right hand side of the road, 9th January

item.title: Fly tipping 4 large canisters marked motor oul, 9th January
item.description:
This flytipping has appeared since yesterday. All canisters feel full. Environmental risk if these leak or are knocked over.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4632, Tewkesbury

item.title: This is next to the speed bump, 9th January
item.description:
The speed bump is in a shocking state and causes a lot of damage to the cars and it is dangerous for cyclists. Thank you for looking into it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Malvern Road, Alstone, Cheltenham

item.title: On the junction of Melville Road and Winston Road, Churchdown, outside Churchdown Secondary School the council have now painted double yellow lines. However, this has not deterred anyone from parking there and from 2.15/2.30 Monday - Friday there are car parked on them illegally. This is causing a huge amount of congestion for residents as well as those trying to get in an out of the school. This week an ambulance struggled to get through due to the inconsiderate/illegal parking of others, 9th January
item.description:
Churchdown Secondary school - daily
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melville Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
